ing: 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix
n: Easiest Delicious Red Wine Steak Sauce
des: "This recipe is a hit with my family and friends and is absolutely easy and so delicious.  It tastes like a merlot steak sauce you would find at a restaurant."
ins: In a small saucepan, mix together the brown gravy mix, red wine and cold water. Season with garlic powder if using. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir until thickened, about 1 minute.
